metadataAttributes.Title: Creative Writing: The Craft of Style
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Your style is as unique and distinctive as your face, your voice, except that you can choose it, you can can work on it, enhance it. In this course we will introduce aspiring writers to the art of putting pressure on written language.  We will study the use of metaphor and imagery, and demonstrate how clarity, grace, and inventiveness in word choice are imperative to a story’s success.  Writers will emerge with the revision skills essential to all writers of good stories and good prose.
